about_the_game:
GAMEPLAY

Overworld

If you’ve ever played Mario & Luigi, you’ll feel right at home here. Explore the overworld as Jeff and Crackhead, conquering top-down platforming challenges and solving clever puzzles using their unique abilities. Secret paths and traps lie in wait at every turn—will you uncover hidden treasures or trigger chaos? The goal is simple: find the exit in each area while encountering a colorful cast of nonsensical monsters. Beware—bumping into them launches you into a battle!

Battles

This isn’t your typical turn-based RPG. Imagine the perfect fusion of strategy and action—fast-paced, simple to learn, and ridiculously fun.

While you wait for your turn to attack, enter Defense Mode, where you can freely move around a dedicated area. Dodge oncoming attacks, charge a parry move, or collect yellow orbs that speed up your attack timer. Timing is everything here.

When your timer is full, switch to Action Mode to unleash your skills. Choose between using items, quick attacks, or powerful character-specific abilities. But be careful—your opponent’s timer is ticking too. Mistime your strike, and you might get countered!

Once Crackhead joins your party, you can pull off devastating combos by chaining your attacks in quick succession. Pro tip: finish your combos with your strongest move to maximize damage!

STORY

After Jeff accidentally opens a portal to another dimension, chaos ensues. Jeff, Crackhead, and possibly the rest of the country get sucked into a bizarre world where time and space are completely scrambled.

The adventure kicks off with Jeff waking up in a mysterious forest. His day doesn’t improve when he meets Jerry, a strange (and not entirely helpful) guide who vaguely explains the situation. With little choice, Jeff sets out northward, battling oddball monsters and searching for his friends. What lies ahead is the adventure of a lifetime in a world unlike anything he’s ever known.

CONTROLS

Seamlessly switch between Jeff and Crackhead using their dedicated buttons for precision gameplay.

Overworld Controls:

  • Jeff: X and Y buttons

  • Crackhead: A and B buttons

  • Abilities: Left action button to use; triggers to swap abilities

  • Jump: Right action button

  • Pause Menu: Manage items, equipment, and quest hints

Battle Controls:

  • Defense Mode: Left action button (hold to charge parry)

  • Action Mode: Right action button for quick attacks, items, or special abilities

Mastering the controls is key to survival, but once you do, every encounter will feel fluid, fast, and incredibly satisfying.
